mods.abstract: Page 52 of the album includes four photographs.; Photograph 1 [237] shows three pigs in a wooden pen. Spectators in suits and hats stand behind the fence.; Photograph 2 [238] shows four pigs in the corner of a pen. Spectators stand behind the fence.; Photograph 3 [239] shows a large pig in a wooden pen. "Announcement! John Deere Buggies" flyer nailed to the inside of the wooden pen.; Photograph 4 [240] shows a large pig standing in profile with spectators gathered behind.
mods.note: All photographs probably taken at the Louisiana State Fair in Shreveport.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
